headline: Pomerantz Law Firm Investigates Claims On Behalf of Investors of Huntington Ingalls Industries, Inc. - HII
summary: NEW YORK, Jan. 28, 2025 /PRNewswire/ -- Pomerantz LLP is investigating claims on behalf of investors of  Huntington Ingalls Industries, Inc.  . Such investors are advised to contact Danielle...

headline: HII is Awarded Task Order for Approximately $296 Million to Support Global Air and Space Operations
summary: MCLEAN, Va., Jan. 28, 2025 -- HII announced today that its Mission Technologies division was awarded a task order valued at approximately $296 million to support U.S. Air Forces in Europe-Air...
